title: Julie Cordua
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with the CEO of THORN, Julie Cordua. THORN is a non profit organization that builds technology to help stop online child sexual abuse. They discuss privacy laws, building a more resilient youth, and how companies can be more proactive in detecting online child sexual abuse.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
